scenario_text.value: Kishhaaaaaah!
Unnngh...!

(That scream paralyzed me...! It’s strong...
Way different from others we’ve fought!)
Agumon, Labramon! Are you okay?!
Unnngh... I, I can’t move, Takuma...
Nnngh... I’m not scared, I’m not scared...

(This is bad, both of them are afraid. The
enemy hasn’t even done anything yet...!)

More of them? No way... It wasn’t the only
one here?
U, UWAHHHHHH!
Agumon!

(We’re surrounded! We’re done for at this
rate!)
(And just when there was only one left...!)
Gigigi... GissshaaaAAAH!
Whoa, what the—?! Is it angry?!

This is bad, Takuma... It’s calling for its
brothers...
It’s got brothers?!
Gissshhh, ssshaaah...

No way... Just one of them was crazy strong
enough...
(Oh no... Are we gonna die here?)
(Die...? How did things turn out this way...)
Aoi... Aoiii!
Ah...ungh...!

(Agumon and Labramon are having a hard
time... What can a kid like me do?)

(Yeah, there’s no way I could beat that
thing. Maybe I should hide and wait it out.)
(Or maybe I should just run away...?)
Takuma! Pull yourself together, Takuma!
(What should I do...?)
I can’t abandon them!
It can’t end like this.
Maybe I could run...
I can’t abandon them!

If things keep going like this, everyone’ll be
wiped out, captured or not!

(No, no, I could never... I could never
abandon my friends!)

(I’m scared, but I have to fight! Fight for
my friends!)

It doesn’t matter how strong this thing is.
We’re saving Aoi, and that’s that!

It doesn’t matter how strong this thing is.
I’m saving everyone, and that’s that!

Right! Your feelings for your friends are
giving me the strength to fight on, Takuma!
Let’s go, Agumon!

Oh...!
What’s this...
What’s wrong, Agumon? You look...

I know we’re in trouble here, but...somehow
I’m bursting with energy!
Agumon...that form...?
No... I’m not Agumon.
(Not Agumon, he says?)

Let’s go, Takuma! I’ll protect everyone...
Me, Greymon!
It can’t end like this.

Is it okay for everything to end here? After
all we’ve done to come this far?

(Everything, end here...? All of our
struggles up to now...?)

No way... We can’t let it end in a place like
this.

All of our lives are on the line, not just
mine. This isn’t the end for them, either!

I’ll rescue my captured friends...
I swear it!

All of us want to save Aoi. We have to do
everything we can!
Let’s go, Agumon!

We’ll get her back, no matter what!
That feeling of yours, it’s...making me...!
...YAHHH!!!
What’s wrong, Agumon? You look...

I know we’re in trouble here, but...somehow
I’m bursting with energy!
See that, Takuma?! I’m doing my best!
Just leave it to good ol’ Tyrannomon!
T...Tyrannomon?!
Maybe I could run...
Dammit... We can’t win like this...

(I know, I could slip past Dokugumon and run
away on my own.)

(But then I’d be abandoning everyone...
Am I really okay with that?)
The Takuma I know isn’t that weak!
He wouldn’t give up here! Not my Takuma!

(He...believes in me? Even when he’s all beat
up like that?)

(Ahh I’m so pathetic! How the hell can
I think about giving up?!)

(I can’t believe I decided things are over
while those guys are still fighting!)

(No point in freaking out about this spider.
It can’t end with my tail between my legs!)

Thanks for the wake-up call. Now it’s our
turn.

Any power will do. Just beat that thing down
and save everyone!
It’s up to you, Agumon! Go nuts out there!
Yeah! Just watch me, I’ll do it!

As strong as we are now, we won’t lose to
that kinda guy!
That’s the way! Show them your power!
Let’s go, Agumon!

Yeah, leave it to me—Ah! Ahhh...
What...this is...?!

My body’s acting funny...! Power...my power
is overflowing!
...YAHHH!!!
What’s wrong, Agumon? You look...

I know we’re in trouble here, but...somehow
I’m bursting with energy!
Agumon?! You okay?!
Okay? I’m more than okay!
I’ll do it! I’ll take them all down at once!
Just watch Tuskmon in action!
